dashboard.label: Authentication Servers
dashboard.description: Displays configured authentication servers and their status across FireMon deployment.

search.query: index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:auth_servers | stats dc(server_id) AS total_servers
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:auth_servers status=failed | stats count AS failed_servers
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:auth_servers | table server_name, server_type, status, last_checked, error_message | sort server_name
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:auth_servers | stats count by status
